name: UMN Theoretical Biology
body:
# About

[Allison Shaw](http://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/eeb/faculty-research/directory/allison-shaw), [Emma Goldberg](http://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/eeb/faculty-research/directory/emma-goldberg), and [Yaniv Brandvain](http://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/plantbio/faculty-research/faculty-directory/yanivbrandvain) facilitate an informal theory and modeling lab group joint meeting.
The aim is to create a forum for providing feedback on ongoing modeling work (rather than a seminar series with polished talks).

Participants are primarily in [EEB](http://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/eeb) and [PlantBio](https://www.cbs.umn.edu/explore/departments/plantbio), but all with aligned goals and interests are welcome.
[Email](mailto:ashaw@umn.edu) if you would like to join the mailing list.

# Schedule

We meet weekly Mondays 3-4pm in Ecology rooms 340 L and Q.
[Click here for the weekly meeting schedule for Fall 2014.](https://github.com/eeg/theory_lab/wiki/Weekly-Meetings)

![chalkboards](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eeg/theory_lab/gh-pages/images/chalkboards.jpg)
